name: Who Killed Milton Rivers
description:
You're brother has been murdered on a train.

It's your job as his brother and as a junior detective to solve the case.

The train arrives at the station in 2 minutes and you need to solve it before you get there.

You can also rewind back to before the murder.

Music: “The Foyer”, from PlayOnLoop.com
